casebody.data:
R & N URSULINE FAMILY LIMITED PARTNERSHIP
v.
PAS A VENDEE, LLC, as Successor in Interest to Matthew B. Moreland, and Norman S. Foster, in His Capacity as Ex-Officio Tax Collector for the City of New Orleans NO. 2018-C-1109 Supreme Court of Louisiana. November 14, 2018 Denied. HUGHES, J., would grant.
